2025-09-23.content: You can now query your databases and update data using the [dedicated Gemini CLI extension for Firestore](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/native/docs/connect-ide-using-mcp-toolbox#about-gemini-cli-extension). This feature is available in beta.

summary.title: Gemini CLI extension for Firestore
summary.summary: Query and update your data using the new Gemini CLI extension for Firestore. Available in beta.

2025-09-02.content: Use [Query insights](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/native/docs/query-insights) to view query performance metrics for your database. This feature is now generally available ([GA](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)).

summary.title: Query insights now GA
summary.summary: Query insights for Firestore are now generally available. You can use this feature to view query performance metrics for your database.

2025-08-01.content: You can [clone an existing database](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/native/docs/manage-databases#clone-database) at a selected timestamp into a new database. This feature is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Clone Database
summary.summary: Clone your existing database to a new database.
